commands.name: Ping
commands.help: Replies with Pong!

commands.name: Pew
commands.help: Shoots back.

commands.name: Magic
commands.help: Ask me a question!

commands.name: Ah
commands.help: \*Screams in `Deprecated`\*

commands.name: Roll
commands.help: Roll `<number of dice>` d `<number of sides>` dice.

commands.name: Pic
commands.help: Returns my Picture.

commands.name: Flip
commands.help: Flips a coin.

commands.name: Help
commands.help: This command.

commands.name: Purpose
commands.help: *"What is my purpose?"*

commands.name: Join
commands.help:
Joins the voice channel you are in and plays the audio of the YouTube video you give it.
    \*Must be first command in chain*

commands.name: Leave
commands.help: Leaves the voice channel and erases the queue.

commands.name: Add
commands.help: Adds a single YouTube video to the end of the queue.

commands.name: AddFirst
commands.help: Adds a single YouTube video to the beginning of the queue.

commands.name: Skip
commands.help: Skips the currently playing song and starts the next up in the queue.

commands.name: Current
commands.help: Returns with the current song playing.

commands.name: Pause
commands.help: Pauses or resumes the current song.

commands.name: AddForRuss
commands.help: Adds a shuffled list of over 900 songs to the queue. Curated by miecatt.

commands.name: List
commands.help: Gives a list of the first five songs in the queue.

commands.name: Rank
commands.help: Shows your current ranking on the server.

commands.name: Top
commands.help: Shows the current top 5 ranking users on the server.

commands.name: Test
commands.help: A function used for testing purposes
